sections.heading: insurer, defined.Affiliated insurer shall mean an insurer who directly or indirectly, through one or more intermediaries, controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with another person

sections.text:
44-6403.Affiliated insurer, defined.

Affiliated insurer shall mean an insurer who directly or indirectly, through one or more intermediaries, controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with another person.

SourceLaws 1986, LB 573, § 6;R.S.1943, (1988), § 60-576;Laws 1994, LB 1074, § 3.
